name: Antiqua
body:
### Welcome to Antiqua's Grave
Antiqua was a way to archive private GitHub repositories so that you could free up space and save a little bit on your monthly bill. I'm of the opinion that billing for private repository slots is a poor choice and this was my response. Since it wasn't a successful project in terms of user adoption, I'm open sourcing it under the MIT license.

### Attributions
See:
* [https://github.com/cookrn/Antiqua/blob/master/public/humans.txt](https://github.com/cookrn/Antiqua/blob/master/public/humans.txt)
* [https://github.com/cookrn/Antiqua/blob/master/Gemfile](https://github.com/cookrn/Antiqua/blob/master/Gemfile)

### Authors and Contributors
Built by @cookrn

### Support or Contact
Having trouble understanding or running Antiqua? Contact me! I'm @cookrn just about everywhere including GMail and I'd love to help.
tagline: A Failed Experiment in Developer Tool-dom
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
